title: Just replaced swollen battery in Pixel 3 XL, factory reset, now I cannot get GMail login
content: Have tried repeatedly to login to GMail so I can setup phone after factory reset but my GMail account will not verify. I'm logged into my email account on home computer and tablets but phone refuses to accept any of the various security measures.
category: Setting up and Personalizing your Device, Google Pixel 3 XL
